Rulings.Edison: ● This card can only negate Trap Cards, not the effects of Traps, so it can't negate an already face-up "Royal Oppression".
Rulings.Tengu: ● This card can only negate Trap Cards, not the effects of Traps, so it can't negate an already face-up "Royal Oppression".
Rulings.Goat: “Seven Tools of the Bandit” may not be activated in a chain to the use of an effect of a continuous Trap that has already been Steve Okegawa, activated, like “Ultimate Offering.”
